title: The hemostatic activity and Mechanistic roles of glucosyloxybenzyl 2-isobutylmalate extract (BSCE) from Bletilla striata (Thunb.) Rchb.f. in Inhibiting pulmonary hemorrhage
content:
Publication date: 30 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 18

Author(s): Gang Liu, Kai-lang Mu, Fei Ran, Jin-mei Liu, Ling-li Zhou, Le-qiang Peng, Guo Feng, Yu-chen Liu, Fu-dao Wei, Ling-li Zhu, Xin-yue Zhang, Yong-ping Zhang, Qing-wen Sun
